actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials

official_title: A bill to prohibit the disposal of solid waste in any State other than the State in which the waste was generated.

summary.text: Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to prohibit the disposal of solid waste in excess of 100 pounds in any State other than the State in which the waste was generated.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the disposal of solid waste in any State other than the State in which the waste was generated.
